subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|み}}
* Generally only found in compounds in modern Japanese, where the pitch accent depends on the entire term.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text: {{ja-noun|み}} # [[seeing]], [[looking]] # the [[look]] or [[appearance]] of something # a [[view]], as of a [[landscape]] #* {{RQ:Manyoshu|20|4360}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man20Yo.html#4360 here] #*: {{lang|ja|夜麻美礼婆 '''見'''能等母之久 可波美礼婆 '''見'''乃佐夜氣久}} #*: {{ja-usex|山 見れば'''見'''の羨しく川 見れば'''見'''の清けく|やま みれば '''み''' の ともしく かわ みれば '''み''' の さやけく|looked to the mountains, and the '''view''' was stunning; looked to the rivers and the '''view''' was clear and refreshing}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|けん}}

# [[seeing]], [[looking]]
# a [[view]], [[perspective]], [[thought]], or [[opinion]] about something
# {{lb|ja|sort=けん|noh}} the [[visual]] [[impact]] the [[performer]]s have on the [[audience]]
# [[window-shopping]]
# a [[window-shopper]]
